display_name: When sleepy, how often perform activities without awareness - Number
description: When sleepy, how often do you perform activities without being aware of doing things for a few seconds or minutes (e.g., drive a car without remembering the last few minutes, read without remembering what you read, etc.)?  (Enter 0 if you do not perform activities without awareness)
domain: if never or rarely checked, slpy_0300=0 and _0310=1
